name: Foliage Espionage
description:
A Kenney Jam 2019 submission...

Featuring an unlikely combination of stealth and puzzle gameplay as... a plant.

Get to the pond before the gardeners cut you down!

Controls:

Move - WASD
Plant Grass - LEFT CLICK
Restart - R

Rules:

Reach the pond
You can only move on grass
Grass is limited
